Title: Remote File Inclusion
Description: Unsafe view template filenames result in a Remote File Inclusion vulnerability.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 2.6.12, all versions starting from 2.7.0 before 2.7.6, all versions starting from  before 3.0.15, all versions starting from 3.1.0 before 3.1.4
NotImpacted: All versions before 2.6.12, all versions starting from 2.6.12 before 2.7.0-stable, all versions starting from 2.7.6 before 3.0.0-stable, all versions starting from 3.0.15 before 3.1.0-stable, all versions starting from 3.1.4
